personalInfo.name: Anil Sen
personalInfo.title: UI/UX and Web Developer
personalInfo.bio: Results-driven UI/UX and Web Developer with 2 years of hands-on experience designing, developing, and deploying high-quality web and mobile applications. Skilled in Angular, Ionic, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Figma, Penpot, Node.js, Firebase (including Cloud Functions), and RxJS. Experienced in architecting responsive UI/UX, implementing scalable backend solutions, and integrating RESTful APIs. Strong problem-solver and collaborative team player with a commitment to writing clean, maintainable code. Successfully delivered multiple end-to-end projects on schedule. Seeking to leverage technical expertise and agile development practices to drive innovation and excellence in dynamic development teams.

skills.name: Angular
skills.description: Web application framework for building dynamic applications

skills.name: TypeScript
skills.description: Typed JavaScript for better development experience

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.description: Core programming language for web development

experience.description: Developing responsive web and mobile applications using Angular, Ionic, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Firebase, with expertise in UI/UX design, wireframing, and prototyping using Figma and Penpot
responsibilities: Designed and developed scalable web and mobile applications using Angular, Ionic, and TypeScript
Implemented pixel-perfect responsive designs and optimized application performance across devices
Integrated RESTful APIs and Firebase services for authentication, storage, and real-time updates
Collaborated with cross-functional teams including designers, QA, and backend developers to deliver high-quality solutions
Conducted code reviews, shared best practices, and mentored junior developers to improve team productivity
achievements: Enhanced application performance by up to 40% through code optimization and efficient state management (RxJS)
Successfully delivered 13+ end-to-end projects within deadlines and aligned with client expectations
Reduced bug reports by 60% by implementing robust testing, debugging, and error-handling strategies
Built reusable UI components and templates that improved development speed by 30%

experience.description: Developing responsive web and mobile applications using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, React, WordPress, and Laravel, with expertise in UI/UX design and performance optimization
responsibilities: Built responsive web applications using Angular and modern CSS frameworks
Integrated RESTful APIs and managed application state
Collaborated with designers to implement pixel-perfect UI components
Participated in agile development processes and sprint planning
achievements: Demonstrated strong commitment to delivering high-quality, user-centric web solutions, resulting in a 35% increase in overall user engagement
Proactively developed a reusable component library that reduced development time by 25% and improved project scalability
Took ownership of multiple end-to-end web projects, ensuring timely delivery and alignment with client objectives
Consistently implemented modern UI/UX practices that enhanced usability, visual appeal, and brand identity across all platforms

projects.title: PartyTambola
projects.description: Mobile app to organize and play Tambola/Housie games with up to 1000 players, for groups, businesses and events, with engagement & rewards
projects.longDescription: PartyTambola brings the classic Tambola / Housie game into the digital age. Whether you're organizing for social groups, small businesses, HR teams, influencers, or family & friends, you can setup a game in just minutes, play with up to 1,000 participants in real time, customize game rules, reward participants, engage followers, and even monetize your group with paid entry or sponsored rewards. It’s designed to be easy to use, highly customizable, social-friendly, and scalable.
features: Real-time gameplay with up to 1,000 players
Customizable game setup (rules, rewards, branding)
Reward & prize integration
Supports monetization for organizers (paid entry / sponsorships)
Engagement tools for social groups, influencers, businesses
User-friendly interface, mobile app based
No physical tickets or boards required
highlights: Supports up to 1,000 players in one game
Easy to set up and play from anywhere

projects.title: HitMVP
projects.description: Hit MVP is a free tool to help you get your app idea across to developers.
projects.longDescription: It helps you break down your vision into clear requirements - user roles, features, screens, everything - fast. You’ll get ballpark cost and time estimates and a complete project plan that any developer can understand. It also has a complete project management system that will help track the development and avoid the painful planning and development mistakes that cost real time and money.
features: Automatic User Role Generation - Identify and define all necessary user roles for the application
Intelligent Feature Identification - Analyze app concept to determine essential functionalities
Screen Flow & Design Planning - Visualize screens and user journeys for better UI/UX
Task Management - Organize tasks and track development progress efficiently
Real-time Progress Tracking - Monitor milestones and overall project status
Cost & Time Estimation - Generate instant estimates for development timeline and budget

projects.title: Aircrew
projects.description: This is an Aircrew job interview training platform that prepares users (aspiring pilots/candidates) for Airlines and Military aviation interviews.
projects.longDescription: Aircrew Training System, explaining its purpose, features, and learning ecosystem. It highlights how the platform prepares candidates for Airline and Military interviews through mentorship, proctored devices, live classes, video solutions, and frequent assessments. I implemented this section to be responsive, well-structured, and easy to read, enabling users to understand the platform’s benefits, daily quizzes, mock exams, and integrated preparation for school, IIT-JEE, and NEET. My work ensures that the content clearly communicates the platform's value while enhancing user engagement and accessibility.
features: Practice Mode: Users receive questions in text form and can practice answering at their own pace.
Simulator Mode: Questions are delivered verbally via avatars, and users can record their answers via selfie video.
Feedback / Analysis: Users can analyze their body language, confidence, and verbal delivery.
Video solutions and recorded class backups
Comprehensive Mock Exams & frequent assessments
Question Bank: Over 1,600 questions across multiple domains, delivered randomly
highlights: Flexible fee refund option based on attendance
Strict no mobile policy and monitored learning environment
Transparent academic tracking with test results & performance analytics
Multiple success stories with high Aircrew job interview training platform

projects.title: Quantum Mosaic
projects.description: An AI-powered platform to streamline and automate investment deal execution, closing the gap between strategy and execution for LPs, GPs, and investment teams.
projects.longDescription: Quantum Mosaic (QM) is a modern platform built for Limited Partners (LPs) and empowering General Partners (GPs). Its mission is to reduce friction between strategic investment planning and operational execution. Leveraging real-time data, predictive analytics, and automation, QM helps investment firms evaluate more deals in less time, improve decision transparency, and optimize workflows to get higher ROI. With QM, investment processes are coordinated by design—minimizing manual overhead, enhancing insights, and enabling teams to spend more time on high-impact tasks rather than repetitive admin work.
features: Deal evaluation acceleration (evaluate twice as many deals in half the time)
Predictive & tailored insights for decision-making
Workflow digitization to reduce manual effort
Transparency and alignment between LPs and GPs
Composable & coordinated operations
Customizable execution models
highlights: AI-driven platform built for LPs & empowering GPs
Helps evaluate more deals faster and reduce manual drag
Bridges gap between strategy and execution
Tailored workflow automation for high ROI
Improves decision making with real-time insights

projects.title: Qasper
projects.description: AI-powered survey and reporting platform for structured data collection and insights.
projects.longDescription: Qasper is a smart survey and reporting solution that enables users to design and schedule surveys with customizable metrics and inputs. Data can be collected on a daily, monthly, quarterly, or yearly basis. The platform automatically generates structured reports in PDF and Excel formats, enhanced with GenAI-driven insights and recommendations for better decision-making.
features: Customizable survey forms with metrics and inputs
Flexible scheduling (daily, monthly, quarterly, yearly)
Automated PDF and Excel report generation
AI-powered report insights and recommendations
Data visualization and trend analysis
Secure cloud-based storage

projects.title: Active Avenue
projects.description: Educational platform for physics learning with interactive simulations
projects.longDescription: An educational web application providing interactive physics simulations and learning materials for students.
features: Interactive simulations
Progress tracking
Quiz system
Responsive design

projects.title: GoWow – The Social Service App
projects.description: Platform to connect verified NGOs, volunteers, and donors to make social impact through contributions and rewards
projects.longDescription: GoWow is a social service ecosystem that unites three types of users — NGOs, individuals (users), and businesses — to support social causes. Through GoWow, you can discover verified NGO profiles, donate materials, participate in volunteering opportunities, and track impact. The app incentivizes positive action by awarding points and coins, which can be redeemed for rewards. It emphasizes transparency, real needs, and community-engagement to create sustainable social change.
features: Verified NGO profiles to ensure real and genuine needs
Donate materials and support causes
Volunteer opportunities listing and participation
Points & coins reward system for contributions
User-friendly interface with community-building features
Track verified hours of volunteering or contributions
Business and NGO collaboration
highlights: Aggregate verified NGOs, volunteers, and donors on one platform
Transparent verification for contributions and materials
Strong community involvement and impact tracking
Organises large-scale events like Samaaj Sewa Championship

projects.title: Mangosteen
projects.description: Stylish cafe offering a blend of global & healthy cuisine with a relaxed, artistic ambiance
projects.longDescription: Mangosteen Café is a trendy eatery known for its curated menu featuring healthy-forward dishes, global flavours, and comforting classics. Guests appreciate the inviting, creative design, attentive service, and a calm, photogenic atmosphere ideal for casual meetups, meals at leisure, or catching up with friends. Though service may slow during peak hours, food quality and overall vibe make it a favorite destination.
features: Diverse menu with healthy and international options
Dessert specials like Baklava with ice cream
Seasonal beverages and unique mocktails
Attentive staff with good service
Relaxed, aesthetic atmosphere suited for various group types
Scenic view during sunset
highlights: Rated ~4.5+ with many positive reviews for ambiance and food
Ideal for casual gatherings or relaxed meals
Standout menu items like Peri Peri Fries, Aglio Olio Pasta, Pink Sauce Pasta
Dessert highlight: Baklava with Ice cream

projects.title: Taskin
projects.description: A work-posting and bidding platform connecting users with service providers.
projects.longDescription: Taskin is a mobile and web application that allows users to post domestic chores, personal tasks, or professional work requirements. Service providers or bidders can then place competitive bids with their proposed price and time to complete the task. This creates a transparent and efficient marketplace for getting work done quickly and affordably.
features: Post domestic or professional tasks
Bidding system for service providers
Real-time notifications for bids and updates
User profiles with ratings and reviews
Secure in-app communication
Cross-platform support
highlights: Connects users with trusted service providers

education.institution: Patel College of Science & Technology, Indore
